name: Genotype-Tissue Expression (GTEx) Project
description: The Genotype-Tissue Expression (GTEx) portal provides open access to data on tissue-specific gene expression and regulation, derived from molecular assays (e.g., WGS, WES, RNA-Seq) on 54 non-diseased tissue sites across nearly 1000 individuals.
attribution: The data used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from: [insert, where appropriate] the GTEx Portal on MM/DD/YY and/or dbGaP accession number phs000424.vN.pN on MM/DD/YYYY.
full_citation: Lonsdale, J., Thomas, J., Salvatore, M. et al. The Genotype-Tissue Expression (GTEx) project. Nat Genet 45, 580â€“585 (2013).
